description: In this course, I will teach you natural remedies for First Aid situations where medical care may not be immediately available.  This can mean the difference between life and death for your animal companion.  You will learn how to use natural remedies for serious conditions such as  shock, concussions, wounds, cuts, injuries to the eyes, sprains and strains, broken bones, burns (including heat stroke), bug bites, upset tummy and more.  You will learn how to use homeopathic remedies and how to decide which remedy to use for what condition.  With this information, you can take homeopathic remedies with you where ever you go, including camping, holidays or even for a hike and have the knowledge on how to help your animal friend when they need you most.
title: Natural First Aid : Valuable Remedies for Your Dog Cat Pets
instructors: Dr. Rehanni Khaseipoul, DVM, CCH, RCSHom
